keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: President Serzh Sargsyan described the killing of Armenians as “unprecedented in terms of volume and ramifications” at that point in history.

headline.print_headline: Mourning and Remembrance on a Somber Centennial for Armenians
headline.main: Armenia, on Day of Rain and Sorrow, Observes 100th Anniversary of Genocide

snippet: President Serzh Sargsyan described the killing of Armenians as “unprecedented in terms of volume and ramifications” at that point in history.
abstract: Thousands of Armenians attend ceremony in Yerevan, Armenia, on centennial of mass killings and forced deportations of Armenians by Turkey; American delegation refers to ceremony euphemistically as 'Centennial Commemoration of the Events of 1915' because, although most of world agrees acts were genocide, Turkey continues to insist they were not.
